name: Who's Nose (GGJ 2021)
description:
Deeds were done. Things happened. Mistakes were made. Now, you have to fix the sticky situations you find yourself in, one finger at at time. This game involves noses, boogers, and recovering lost items.

This game was designed to be able to be played with your nose for a diversifier for the Global Game Jam (2021). (Smells like Success: Design a game you can play with your nose)
